import useUpdatedRef from'./useUpdatedRef';import{useEffect}from'react';/**
 * Attach a callback that fires when a component unmounts
 *
 * @param fn Handler to run when the component unmounts
 * @category effects
 */export default function useWillUnmount(fn){const onUnmount=useUpdatedRef(fn);useEffect(()=>()=>onUnmount.current(),[]);}
